page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF....
page.content: I live on a farm in{Cowpen Bewley.}At 7.30 I get up and get washed and dressed in some overalls and I help to feed the sheep and cows.At about 8.05 I go in and have a breakfast of cereals and milk.At 8.25 I change into my school uniform and at 8.30 I travel to school in our car.I play in the playground with my friends until the bell rings at 8.55. In class we all read while our teacher does the register then we go into the hall for assembly with prayers and a story.We return to class and do{maths}until playtime.I play {football}or races with my friends. After that we do{English}and write stories which I enjoy very much. The bell for dinner rings at 11.55.
